section.heading: “Non-English speaking person” defined.
section.text: As used in this section, the term “non-English speaking person” shall mean a person whose native speaking language is a language other than English, and who continues to use his or her native language as his or her primary means of oral and written communication.

annotations.annotation: Sept. 2, 1976, D.C. Law 1-79, title IV, § 402, 23 DCR 2050
